<Link id="l03650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3650"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3651"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The diagram below shows the steps involved in the conversion of a predicated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3652"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// store instruction to its .new predicated new-value form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3653"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3654"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: It doesn&#39;t include conditional new-value stores as they can&#39;t be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3655"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// converted to .new predicate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3656"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3657"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               p.new NV store &#91; if(p0.new)memw(R0+#0)=R2.new &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3658"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                ^           ^</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3659"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               /             \\ (not OK. it will cause new-value store to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3660"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              /               X conditional on p0.new while R2 producer is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3661"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             /                 \\ on p0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3662"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            /                   \\.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3663"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     p.new store                 p.old NV store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3664"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;if(p0.new)memw(R0+#0)=R2&#93;    &#91;if(p0)memw(R0+#0)=R2.new&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3665"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            ^                  ^</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3666"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             \\                /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3667"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              \\              /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3668"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               \\            /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3669"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                 p.old store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3670"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             &#91;if (p0)memw(R0+#0)=R2&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3671"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3672"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following set of instructions further explains the scenario where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3673"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conditional new-value store becomes invalid when promoted to .new predicate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3674"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3675"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3676"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123; 1) if (p0) r0 = add(r1, r2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3677"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2) p0 = cmp.eq(r3, #0) &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3678"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3679"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   3) if (p0) memb(r1+#0) = r0  --&gt; this instruction can&#39;t be grouped with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3680"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the first two instructions because in instr 1, r0 is conditional on old value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3681"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of p0 but its use in instr 3 is conditional on p0 modified by instr 2 which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3682"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is not valid for new-value stores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3683"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Predicated new value stores (i.e. if (p0) memw(..)=r0.new) are excluded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3684"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the &quot;Conditional Store&quot; list. Because a predicated new value store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3685"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would NOT be promoted to a double dot new store. See diagram below:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3686"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function returns yes for those stores that are predicated but not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3687"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// yet promoted to predicate dot new instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3688"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                          +---------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    /-----| if (p0) memw(..)=r0 |---------\\~</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                   ||     +---------------------+         ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          promote  ||       /\\       /\\                   ||  promote</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                   ||      /||\\     /||\\                  ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                  \\||/    demote     ||                  \\||/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                   \\/       ||       ||                   \\/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       +-------------------------+   ||   +-------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       | if (p0.new) memw(..)=r0 |   ||   | if (p0) memw(..)=r0.new |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       +-------------------------+   ||   +-------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3699"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                        ||           ||         ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                        ||         demote      \\||/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3701"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      promote        ||         \\/ NOT possible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3702"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                        ||           ||         /\\~</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3703"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       \\||/          ||        /||\\~</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3704"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                        \\/           ||         ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      +-----------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3706"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      | if (p0.new) memw(..)=r0.new |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      +-----------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                           Double Dot New Store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the most basic instruction for the .new predicated instructions and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3711"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new-value stores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, all of the following instructions will be converted back to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3713"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same instruction:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3714"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) if (p0.new) memw(R0+#0) = R1.new  ---&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3715"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) if (p0) memw(R0+#0)= R1.new      -------&gt; if (p0) memw(R0+#0) = R1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3716"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3) if (p0.new) memw(R0+#0) = R1      ---&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3717"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3718"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To understand the translation of instruction 1 to its original form, consider</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3719"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a packet with 3 instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3720"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123; p0 = cmp.eq(R0,R1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3721"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (p0.new) R2 = add(R3, R4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3722"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   R5 = add (R3, R1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3723"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3724"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if (p0) memw(R5+#0) = R2 &lt;--- trying to include it in the previous packet</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3725"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3726"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This instruction can be part of the previous packet only if both p0 and R2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3727"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are promoted to .new values. This promotion happens in steps, first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3728"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predicate register is promoted to .new and in the next iteration R2 is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3729"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// promoted. Therefore, in case of dependence check failure (due to R5) during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3730"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// next iteration, it should be converted back to its most basic form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3731"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3732"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the new value instruction for a given store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3733" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstrinfo/#a9a82bbf1e42873015a50e5dc53358ffc"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstrinfo/#a9a82bbf1e42873015a50e5dc53358ffc">HexagonInstrInfo::getDotNewOp</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3734"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NVOpcode = Hexagon::getNewValueOpcode(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3735"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NVOpcode &gt;= 0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Valid new-value store instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3736"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NVOpcode;</span></CodeLine>
